8 Synthetic Control 8.1 Preliminaries Here we replicate some results from Abadie, Diamond and Hainmueller (2015). Results are similar but not the same since I ignore the cross-validation exercise to choose the v weights. Nevertheless, conclusions remain the same. Original replication files can be found here.
